channel.title: Crazy-PvP || 317 Old-School Server || 100% Uptime!
channel.description:
[align=center]
[img]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac202/SynysterSnipers/crazypvp.png[/img]
[img]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac202/SynysterSnipers/HomeIcon-1.png[/img] [url=http://www.crazy-pvp.com/forum]Crazy-PvP Website[/url]
Crazy PvP is an old school server bringing back the golden days. With plenty to do, this server NEVER gets boring. Constant updates are exciting. An owner that listens to it's players? Even better. There's really no reason not to join this wonderful server. I can assure you that you will enjoy your stay.
[b]To download the client, go to the website and it will be along the side.[/b]
[hr]
[b]Main Features:[/b]
- Jad - Barrows - Wonderful PK'ing - Perfect combat system - NO GRINDING! - Awesome community - Respectful owner - Great staff team
[hr]
Many servers that you experience today have mass amounts of grinding. Grinding leads to being bored which ultimately leads to quitting. At Crazy PvP, there's so much to do that you will never get bored.
[img]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac202/SynysterSnipers/nogrinding.png[/img]
[hr]
Don't feel like training your combat? No worries, we've got an amazing skilling system. Every skill is fully coded and unlike most servers, they actually make money!
[img]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac202/SynysterSnipers/skilling.png[/img]
[hr]
Still not convinced? Take a look at our perfect combat system. Switches are wonderful and the hybridding switches are phenomenal. No dragging is always best, right?
Also, easy access to popular PK'ing spots.
[img]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac202/SynysterSnipers/combat.gif[/img]
[img]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac202/SynysterSnipers/hyrbidding.gif[/img]
[img]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac202/SynysterSnipers/activepking.png[/img]
[hr]
Feel like putting your skills to the ultimate test? Look no further and jump right into our fully coded Duel Arena!
[img]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac202/SynysterSnipers/duelarena.png[/img]
[hr]
Why wouldn't you join this server? If you want to relive the golden days, this server is right for you. See you around! =)
[img]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac202/SynysterSnipers/HomeIcon-1.png[/img] [url=http://www.crazy-pvp.com/forum]Crazy-PvP Website[/url][/align]

Crazy-PvP Website

Crazy PvP is an old school server bringing back the golden days. With plenty to do, this server NEVER gets boring. Constant updates are exciting. An owner that listens to it’s players? Even better. There’s really no reason not to join this wonderful server. I can assure you that you will enjoy your stay.

To download the client, go to the website and it will be along the side.

Many servers that you experience today have mass amounts of grinding. Grinding leads to being bored which ultimately leads to quitting. At Crazy PvP, there’s so much to do that you will never get bored.

Don’t feel like training your combat? No worries, we’ve got an amazing skilling system. Every skill is fully coded and unlike most servers, they actually make money!

Also, easy access to popular PK’ing spots.
